resources.string: You need to give this app permission to change the settings before it will work, the only setting it will touch is the screen time-out.

For adding the widget to the home screen:
 - Press the home button to get to the home screen.
 - Hold finger down on an area that is not occupied by an icon.
 - Select "widgets".
 - Scroll to "ScreenWidget Free" widget.
 - Drag and drop it into the home screen to where you want it.
 - Click on widget to change screen timeout mode.
 - If you want full version with extra features and settings, while also no ads inside, please consider purchasing full version of this application
